cast.name: 皮埃尔·保罗·帕索里尼 Pier Paolo Pasolini

introduction: Open Your Eyes! is a new documentary (2008) on Pier Paolo Pasolini's "Salò o le 120 giornate di Sodoma" which consists of behind-the-scenes footage shot by British film journalist Gideon Bachmann during the final scenes of the film. One can see Pasolini, Tonino Delli Colli, the actors and crew at work, with a few interviews included.
